message.original: 狙弓の証 ハンター戦術試練
message.translation: Hunter Tactics Trial: An Ambushing Bow

message.original: ハンターの基本戦術を学ぶため 修練の祠にて試練に挑む
message.translation: In order to learn the basic tactics of Hunter, challenge the trial of the Training Chapel

message.original: 修練の祠前の崖下にいる白衛騎士団員と話す
message.translation: Speak with White Knight at the base of the cliff before Training Chapel

message.original: 修練の祠内のウィルソンと話す
message.translation: Speak with Wilson in Training Chapel

message.original: 弓射ちで敵を攻撃せよ
射撃の最適距離から弓射ちで敵を攻撃せよ
message.translation: Attack the enemy with Loose from the optimum distance

message.original: 爆矢射ちで敵を攻撃せよ
message.translation: Attack the enemy with Explosive Arrow

message.original: 爆矢射ちで仕込んだ矢を起爆させよ
message.translation: Attack the enemy by detonating the explosive arrow

message.original: 前蹴りで敵を攻撃せよ
message.translation: Attack the enemy with Front Kick

message.original: 矢の装填を成功させよ
最深部のゴブリンを全滅せよ
message.translation: Defeat the remaining Goblins in the inner sanctum

message.original: 最奥にある＜狙弓の証＞を入手する
message.translation: Collect the proof of completing the trial

message.original: 白竜神殿のレンテンに経緯を報告する
message.translation: Report back to Renton in the White Dragon Temple
